events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Our team appreciates your interest and will review your credentials thoroughly.
Your application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering cluster given your experience in software development and programming languages.
A recruiter from our engineering department has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the upcoming steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening of your application and resume is complete, and we are impressed with your software development background and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm and professionalism.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. This interview will focus on your coding skills and software engineering knowledge.
